# TubeGrow

## Summary
TubeGrow is an AI-powered YouTube analytics and growth platform for creators. It helps you understand channel performance, get AI insights, improve YouTube SEO (titles, descriptions, tags), and repurpose long videos into high-performing Shorts.

## Product Status (Dec 2025)
TubeGrow is currently waitlist-only early access. Pricing is not public yet.

## What TubeGrow Does
- Analytics dashboards and channel insights
- YouTube SEO help (metadata, keyword targeting, optimization)
- AI-assisted workflows (questions, recommendations, summaries)
- Viral Shorts moment discovery from long videos
